title: (x) Raisin Bran cereal logo - Bodega Sans {Justin}
content:
Anyone have a guess for the Raisin Bran letters? Or know where I can download?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [raisinbran.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185509/http:/typophile.com/files/raisinbran.jpg) | 42.71 KB |
author: dfx_3000

comments.content:
Good eye! Some flattening/widening and letter styling and you are quite close.

I’m a bit surprised that the Kellogg folks wouldn’t be designing their brands with more original lettering than this, but maybe that’s the form ‘original lettering’ takes these days — take an exisiting design and play with it.

- Mike Yanega
